channel.title: NPC touble xD
channel.description: is there a way where i can make an npc say something i want it to say when people log on and they can see it? thanks

item.title: NPC touble xD
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

well nick you almost got it what you do is go on you server find a npc tat talks and search for that in npc handler and then change id of that that sorry i cant help out more my main source is gonne and im coding a 508 lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 11:38:47 am[/size][hr]well heres better ok what you do is go into npchandler and search for if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { then you will get somthing like this if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Test"; } what you do is just change npc type the npc id and the text update to to w.e he says if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; }

Read full topic

item.title: NPC touble xD
item.dc:creator: @Nick2trick Nick2trick
item.description:
@Nick2trick wrote:

yh, go to to “NpcHandler” in your source file, then type in the npc’s code, then put the x,y corridinates to where ya wanna put em. Good luck ;D
